content.question: Frank Gehry selected titanium instead of more traditional materials when designing the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: To create a reflective effect that utilized surface and sunlight
To celebrate the advances of scientific innovation in Bilbao
To create a cost-efficient but highly effective fire-resistant exterior
To demonstrate the use of environmentally responsible materials

content.answer: To create a reflective effect that utilized surface and sunlight

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
